Class
Description
GlobalVariablesChecker
A singleton class with the responsibility of checking variables declarations, assignments and conditions, when appeared before their actual declaration or initialization in the global scope.
Method
This class represents a single method scope.
MethodCallsChecker
A singleton Class which holds references to the existing methods in the program, alongside their names.

a class of Method errors exceptions.
Scondition
A S-java condition (if/while).
Scope
This class represents a scope in the s-Java program.
ScopeError
a class of Scope errors exceptions.
Sjavac
This class operates the entire Simplified Java Verifier program.
SjavaFileReader
This class 'reads' the given Sjava file, and extract it's content into a list of String, in order to be able to process it easily.
